nodes.title: Support for custom group claims with the comma-separated values
Add audience verification with several tests
Support ClaimValue dynamic calls to JWT claims, add integration tests
Resolve several issues reported by Sonar
Support for the keys on the file system
Correct processing of the standard scope claim
Moving the tck module into testsuite/basic and minor refactorings
Fixed whitelistAlgorithms configuration. Optional of List not mapped correctly.
Key resolution optimizations and other minor updates
Added configurations to better control JWT validations-
Applying the formatter/import order changes after the smallrye parent upgrade
Removing the monolitic header/groups function and updating the error message
Throw the exception with the useful message if context is null
Remove Base64 decoder code from KeyLocationResolver
Add an error message when a public key is loaded as a resource using mp.jwt.verify.publickey.location
Add JAX-RS features and filters / Disabled CDI and auth mechanism components
Fixing the key resolver to check the matching JWK keys
Update to new artifactId and version scheme
Prevent NPE in JWTAuthFilter and handle other token locations
[DO NOT MERGE] Configuring default groups claim and custom token headers
#29: Extracting Jose4j code into its own class, syncing the code between Quarkus ElytronJWTCallerPrincipal and DefaultJWTCallerPrincipal
Make it simpler to write custom principals, and fix a typo in JWTAuthContextInfoProvider
Update version to 1.1.0 and update docs/local tck tests
Initial checkpoint of principal and config classes
Support public RSA keys with 1024 bit length
Issue#253 Use a Galleon provisioned WildFly Elytron based configuration
Remove redundant import and correct final line.
Fixed release action to use next version.
Refactor JWTEncryptionImpl to remove redundant code paths
Fixed issues with sign and decrypt.
Removed duplicated configuration documentation in README.
Throw NotAuthorizedException if a JWT is sent to an unauthenticated endpoint and is not valid
Support for creating tokens from JsonObject
Support Quarkus Dev mode with the context without the keys
Load the token resource from the file system
Update some resource loading methods to check the context class loader
Force a JWK refresh if no JWK with a matching kid is available
Fix testsuite and doc links in readme
Add a method to init JwtClaimsBuilder from JsonWebToken
Fix #222 - Consistent injection and conversion on all supported types of Claims.
Add documentation for smallrye encrypt and sign properties
Fixed ignore. It was ignoring subpackage.
Fixes #216 - Move current documentation to Antora.
Support Boolean and boolean as a valid injection point.
Fail the CI build if formatter rules fail.
#211 - Prototype work to support custom Claim Converters.
#80 - Added configuration to validate required claims in the JWT.
#204 - Adding property to skip TCK in Semaphore.
corrected a typo in the javadoc
KeyLocationResolver, give debug information about authContextInfo
Correction due to build time formatting.
Support the cases when groups is a string or complex object
Add constructor to allow manual dependency injection in tests
Fix typo in the method name of DefaultJWTParser.getCallerPrincipalFactory
Add configuration to always check `Authorization` header
Add the configuration section to README
Support the claim paths with the namespaces
Add sign/innerSign/encrypt methods accepting a key location, checking  RSA key size, better docs
Support for the Elliptic Curve keys
It should be possible to specify a JWK set of more than one key using the `mp.jwt.verify.publickey` config property
Add support for custom token schemes
Attempt to decode using Base64URL for JWK and JWKS.
It should be possible to specify a JWK set of more than one key using the `mp.jwt.verify.publickey` config property.
Don't use a Stream for a simple check
Support typed Optional claim injection as required by the specification and TCK.
Initial JWT builder code and tests
Check if the resource is protected to select the appropriate response.
fixed Elliptic Curve PEM decoding problem
Move NullJsonWebToken into an independent class and add ProviderInjectionSupport
Fix KeyLocationResolver to check for all types of keys with HTTP(s) url
Optimize KeyLocationResolver, support for PEM certs
Reverting to checking the scheme without URI conversion to avoid side-effects on Win
Remove Optional for the config properties with the default values
Report UnresolvableKeyException in the inner-sign/decrypt case, update JAX-RS filter too
Issue#372 Status code should be 500 when public key cannot be resolved
Move the JAX-RS related code into smallrye-jwt-jaxrs
Support for expireIn build method and other minor cleanup
Use UUID for the 'jti' claim, and update ResourceUtils to have a separate InputStream utility
Better support for the PS256 test
Better handling of the wrong JWT build key locations
Split the implementation module into common, jwt-auth, jwt-build
Update the build and release workflows to setup java at v1
Correct letter case of SmallRye in documentation
Add enum values for RSASSA-PSS and PBES2 with HMAC algorithms
Fix the property name typo in the docs
Support for the configured secret key location
Simpler token symmetric signing and encryption support
Support custom schemes for the custom headers
Fix JWT TTL time units message
Initial implementation of a DPoP proofing mechanism
Relax the key validation by default on MP JWT 1.2 branch
Allow for setting JWE headers after innerSign
Deprecate JwtClaimsBuilder.json, rename JwtSigningUtils to JwtBuilderUtils, create JwtProvider once
Using the correct default key encryption algorithm
Support the conversion of JsonObject to custom types
Accept tokens without iat if time-to-live is 0 or negative
Cache configured PEM keys and check configured kid for JWK keys
Ensure JWT ID is unique when the claims or signature builder is reused
Use JWK 'alg' and 'kid' when creating JWT if these headers are not set
Verify fully formatted PEM key can be accepted and invalid key causes UnresolvedKeyException
Reference all MP JWT 1.2 props and smallrye-jwt deprecated properties
Fix the error messages referring to 'key-location' and remove the unused log message
Update README to refer to MP JWT 1.2 and remove the references to RSA-OAEP-256 being the default key enc algorithm
Resolves #444 Update message logged when EE security is not available.
Remove a long time deprecated JwtClaimsBuilder.json() method
Merge the mpjwt12 branch to master
Complete the removal of smallrye.jwt.sign.key-location and smallrye.jwt.encrypt.key-location properties
Use correct resource location for service loader logging of JWTCallerPrincipalFactory
Remove deprecated JWT Build API inner-sign none signature support and key location properties
Reuse Jose4j HttpsJwk class for managing HTTP based JWK sets
Fix configuration key location inconsistency and deprecate the inner-sign none signatures
Enforce types of the directly supported claims when they are set as Objects
Add methods for secret key generation (#342)
Fix JWT build impl to load PEM keys correctly when no default algorithm is used
Remove Optional for the config properties with the default values
